summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Universal Product Search Platform with NEW VENDOR DETAILS feature. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate) with full vendor information integration. Frontend fully functional with vendor details modal, new Vendors tab, and all 5 tabs working correctly. All vendor features implemented and working as expected.
passed_tests: Health check endpoint returns healthy status
Valid product search with proper results structure
Vendor details included in all search results (10/10 results)
Vendor contact details properly formatted (100% valid email, phone, address)
Vendor types and verification statuses working (Global Suppliers, Local Markets, Online Marketplaces)
Homepage loads with hero section and search form
Search functionality working with AI processing
Product cards display vendor name and 'View Vendor Details' button
Vendor Details modal opens and displays all required information (Email, Phone, Address, Response Time, Years in Business)
New Vendors tab working and displays Vendor Directory (49 vendors)
Vendor cards in directory show contact info, verification badges, and business details
All 5 tabs working: Products, Vendors, Charts, Insights, Sources (5/5 success)
Sticky header with compact search appears after results
